body:
Hello there. I am working on a definition to simulate the daylight for different building shapes. The definition was working pretty well, but since I added the Split Building Mass component, the simulation doesn't work anymore. The component turns red and give the error message "Solution exception: 'nonetype' object has no attribute "Transform". I tried to test the same component in a smaller definition, with a simpler geometry and I had the same message, except that the "Transform" was changed by "X". Can anyone help me with this error?



Thanks a lot.
topic: Split Building Mass component not working in the simulation
